titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I presented Mr Balfour for his degree in a short speech, which spoiled my morning in preparing. Lord Durham also received his degree: he was presented by Principal Jevons. The undergraduates were as noisy as might have been expected.
In the evening we dined at Bede College, with the Principal – a dull party.
